scripts.dev_all: concurrently "npm run dev_front" "npm run dev port=3000"
scripts.dev_virta: concurrently "cd virta && npm run start" "npm run virta port=4000 AGENCY_URL=http://localhost:8080 VON_WEBSERVER_URL=http://findy.local:80/von"
scripts.dev_virta_az: concurrently "cd virta && npm run start" "npm run virta port=4000 AGENCY_URL=http://localhost:8080 VON_WEBSERVER_URL=https://hiekkalaatikko.northeurope.cloudapp.azure.com/von"
scripts.von-setup: rm -rf von-network && git clone https://github.com/bcgov/von-network && cd von-network && ./manage build
scripts.agency-start: PORTS="8000:8000 8080:8080" VON_WEBSERVER_ADDR=http://host.docker.internal:80 bash -c './aries-cloudagent-python/scripts/run_docker start --log-level info --inbound-transport http 0.0.0.0 8000 --outbound-transport http --endpoint http://0.0.0.0:8000 --admin 0.0.0.0 8080 --multitenant --multitenant-admin --jwt-secret Something_very_secret_123 --genesis-url http://host.docker.internal:80/genesis --admin-insecure-mode --monitor-ping --debug-connections'
scripts.agency-start-k8s: PORTS="8000:8000 8080:8080" VON_WEBSERVER_ADDR=http://findy.local:80/von bash -c './aries-cloudagent-python/scripts/run_docker start --log-level info --inbound-transport http 0.0.0.0 8000 --outbound-transport http --endpoint http://0.0.0.0:8000 --admin 0.0.0.0 8080 --multitenant --multitenant-admin --jwt-secret Something_very_secret_123 --genesis-url http://findy.local:80/von/genesis --admin-insecure-mode --monitor-ping --debug-connections'
scripts.agency-start-az: PORTS="8000:8000 8080:8080" VON_WEBSERVER_ADDR=https://hiekkalaatikko.northeurope.cloudapp.azure.com/von bash -c './aries-cloudagent-python/scripts/run_docker start --log-level info --inbound-transport http 0.0.0.0 8000 --outbound-transport http --endpoint http://0.0.0.0:8000 --admin 0.0.0.0 8080 --multitenant --multitenant-admin --jwt-secret Something_very_secret_123 --genesis-url https://hiekkalaatikko.northeurope.cloudapp.azure.com/von/genesis --admin-insecure-mode --monitor-ping --debug-connections'
scripts.build_endorser: npm run clean && npm run build && cd virta && npm run build &&  cp -r ./build/ ../bin/virta
scripts.build_idp: npm run clean && npm run build
